title: Devers: Boston in past, will play where Giants want
description: Rafael Devers was formally introduced by the Giants on Tuesday, strolling into the clubhouse side-by-side with Barry Bonds. And whatever went wrong in Boston, Devers is done discussing any issues he had with the Red Sox and eager to move forward.

title: Sources: Haliburton has calf strain, to have MRI
description: Pacers star Tyrese Haliburton has suffered a strained right calf and will undergo an MRI to determine the severity of the injury, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.
author: Jamal Collier

title: 'The abuse never stops' - Lionesses to avoid social media
description: Alessia Russo and some of her England team-mates will not use social media during Euro 2025 because online abuse can be "really damaging."

title: Sacking Postecoglou was emotionally difficult - Levy
description: Tottenham chairman Daniel Levy says sacking manager Ange Postecoglou after he led the club to victory in the Europa League was "emotionally" difficult.

title: Memphis has raised $201 million of $226 million needed for Liberty Stadium renovations, AD says
description: Memphis has raised $201 million toward a $226 million goal for renovations to Simmons Bank Liberty Stadium, athletic director Ed Scott said June 17.

title: Wenceel Pérez, Javier Báez bring big bats in Detroit Tigers' 7-3 win over Pirates
description: Detroit Tigers score: Wenceel Pérez drove in three runs while Javier Báez had a pair of homers in the Tigers' 7-3 win over the Pirates.

title: Berrada reaffirms Man Utd's 2028 title target and compares Amorim to Pep
description: Manchester United chief executive Omar Berrada remains confident the club can mark their 150th anniversary in 2028 by winning both the men’s and women’s league titles and believes there are similarities between head coach Ruben Amorim and Man City boss Pep Guardiola.

title: Leipzig's Sesko price tag revealed amid Arsenal interest
description: RB Leipzig want a deal worth somewhere between £68.4m [€80m] and £85.5m [€100m] for Arsenal target Benjamin Sesko, according to Sky in Germany.
